title: Frames Keep Dropping in ARAM After Kled Update
body:
Hey guys, just updated league a couple hours ago and when I try to play ARAM, the frames just drop drastically. My computer keeps freezing at random moments and when you are playing against a {{champion:53}} and you're screen keeps freezing than you're gonna have a bad time{{item:3070}} . I've checked my video settings and put it at VERY LOW and still keeps freezing. I didn't have this problem before {{champion:240}}  was released. Please help me fix this issue.

Please upvote this so Riot can see it.

replies.body: Your FPS might be dropping due to an issue with your game file, or something else entirely like outdated drivers.  To rule out these possibilities, I suggest going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to get get you back in the game without issues.  Let me know if you have any issues afterward!
I just have god awful lag after 6.16, before i was perfectly fine
